dmit2015.model

Class Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • dmit2015.model.Circle

  • public class Circle
extends java.lang.Object
    The Circle class models a circle shape.
    Version:
    2018.01.15
    Author:
    Sam Wu

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Circle()
      Construct a circle with a radius of 1
      Circle(double radius)
      Construct a circle with a specified radius

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getArea()
      Returns the area of the circle using the formula: area = PI * radius * radius
      double getCircumference()
      Return the circumference of the circle using the formula: circumference = 2 * PI * radius
      double getDiameter()
      Returns the diameter of the circle using the formula: diameter = radius * 2
      double getRadius()
      Return the radius of the circle
      void setRadius(double radius)
      Set the radius

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
